long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Grazily Applier" is a web extension designed to streamline the job application process for users of Grazily.com, a job search platform. This innovative tool simplifies the often tedious and time-consuming task of filling out job applications by automating the process. With the "Grazily Applier," users can effortlessly populate application forms with their personal and professional information stored within the extension, reducing the need for manual data entry.
